com.qtfx.lib.task.file

Class FileScanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinTask<java.lang.Void>
      • com.qtfx.lib.task.Task
        • com.qtfx.lib.task.TaskRun
          • com.qtfx.lib.task.file.FileScanner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Void>

    public class FileScanner
extends TaskRun
    A FileScanner scans the source directories and optionally their sub-directories, notifying each file or directory found. It is implemented as a task to allow it to be executed in a separated thread with all the control options of a task.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
